data.eml:eml: Eurycleonus talamellii n. sp. of Cleonine weevil from the Moroccan desert (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Lixinae: Cleonini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Meregalli, Massimo (2005): Eurycleonus talamellii n. sp. of Cleonine weevil from the Moroccan desert (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Lixinae: Cleonini). Zootaxa 1053: 23-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170025
